snippet.title: Sailaway Trailer
snippet.description:
Short impression of Sailaway III.  The best virtual sailing simulator. 
With real weather, global scale, real sail trim, accurate nocturnal sky, customizable trim lines and deck layout and the tools to build your own boat.

Learn the basics of sailing, improve your sail trim skills, practice celestial navigation, relax or push the limits.
Sailaway III is the platform, but it's the sailors who build the boats, organize races and make the virtual sailing world worthwhile.

Available on the Sailaway.world website https://sailaway.world 
and on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/2631870/Sailaway_III/
